import pic from './Apple-12.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; function Products(props) { let [name,SetName] = useState(0); function nameChange(){ SetName(name=name+1); } function nameSub(){ SetName(name=name-1); } return (
{props.name}

{props.disc}

Rs. {props.price}

Add Product
        {name}
Product Details...
); } export default Products;
